name: fLight - WIP Demo
description:
fLight is a physics platformer where combat and movement are heavily integrated, and the goal is to turn on lights. This is a solo project that was originally for school. This demo build contains about 20 levels in various states of polish. Each level is beatable.

All assets are subject-to-change (especially sounds). I'll be improving them as time goes on.

Disclaimer: I have not been able to test this on very many machines. It's likely terribly optimized, so keep that in mind. Everything is in progress.

My specs (these or better should work):
GTX 970
i7 4690k
8Gb RAM

(Note: skip levels with "K")
